meanings.definition: A univalent radical derived from a sulfonic acid by removal of the hydroxyl group.
meanings.sent1: The chemist identified the sulfonyl in the compound.
meanings.sent2: Sulfonyl compounds are commonly used in pharmaceuticals.
meanings.sent3: The sulfonyl group decided to throw a party in the test tube.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as a sulfonyl bond.
meanings.sent5: The bright yellow color of the sulfonyl made it easy to spot in the mixture.
